snippet.title: Merchants of Rosewall - Launch & Gameplay Trailer!
snippet.description:
In this cozy visual novel meets shopkeeper simulator, you are a new Merchant in the bustling city of Rosewall where you can:

🌹 Craft goods, hire Companions, and manage your own shop!
🌹 Immerse yourself in a fantasy world where conflict is a thing of the past!
🌹 Uncover secrets and unravel a mystery of the city!

Merchants of Rosewall will be releasing on March 4th, 2025. Wishlist it and play the demo today! https://bit.ly/49Yd0gX

#cozygames #indiegame #visualnovel #cozygaming #indiedev #fantasy #shopkeeper #videogames #wholesomegames #furry #furries #merchantsofrosewall #rosewall #merchantofrosewall #elves #elf #orc #dwarf
